post: Our affiliate partner, History By Mail is offering 5% off your order  and History by Mail will donate another 5% of your purchase to support BRI teachers. Shop today!  https://bit.ly/4n9iHQC

Today, we recognize the Attainment Company, Inc. as a proud supporter of our Civics for Everyone initiative. They have dedicated four decades to empowering individuals with disabilities by providing resources that promote independence and self-determination. Find out more about our Civics for Everyone initiative.  https://bit.ly/4jBYuQp

Meet BRIs 2025 Student Fellow, Alessandro De Stefano! Alessandro is a junior at Centreville High School in Clifton, Virginia. He is an academically driven student who loves history and dreams of becoming a lawyer. Outside of school, he is a founding member and the electrical lead for his First Tech Challenge robotics team, Mecha Minds  #26394, and an academic bowl competitor. BRIs Student Fellowship is a six-month educational program that helps high school students develop as leaders and develop skills in building civil society. Learn more about BRI's Student Fellowship!  https://bit.ly/3f2q66h

#OTD, 250 years ago, the Battle of Bunker Hill was fought just outside Boston. Discover the gripping story of the battle in our latest A250 Mini Documentary! This pivotal clash between British troops and colonial militia shaped the early days of the American Revolution. Learn how grit, sacrifice, and unexpected turns of events set the stage for a long struggle for independence.  https://bit.ly/4dXDd2q  #A250  #AmericanRevolution  #BunkerHill

Have you heard about the Civic Star Challenge? This contest is a great way for educators to celebrate 250 years of American independence in the 2025-26 school year! Bring the ideals of the Declaration of Independence to life in your classroom with the Civic Star Challenge starting this fall! How to participate: 📘 Engage: Use ready-to-go, flexible lesson plans to teach the Declarations timeless themes. 📸 Share: Submit a simple form to spotlight your students activities. 🏆 Win: Earn the chance to win exciting prizes throughout the school year! Tap the link in bio to sign up now and be the first to hear when the Civic Star Challenge launches in August 2025!  https://bit.ly/4dovtpM 🤝 @icivicsinc  #CivicLearning  #CivicEducation  #Civics  #iCivics

#OTD in 1777, the Continental Congress adopted the "Stars and Stripes" as the national flag of the United States of America. Today, we celebrate that this banner has flown for nearly 250 years. The next time you need an American flag (or any flag for that matter!) remember that Federal Flags, LLC gives back to BRI when you use the code 'BRI5' at check-out.  https://bit.ly/3z2vhMW

#OTD in 1775, the Second Continental Congress established the Continental Army. Today, we encourage you to discover the inspiring story of Joseph Plumb Martin, a young patriot who joined the Continental Army at just 15 years old. His memoir, "A Narrative of Some of the Adventures, Dangers, and Sufferings of a Revolutionary Soldier," offers a powerful glimpse into the courage and sacrifice of those who fought for our nation's independence.  https://bit.ly/44fb6bJ  #BillofRightsInstitute  #AmericanRevolution  #PrimarySource

The road to American independence was long and bloody. Our latest A250 Mini Documentary examines the Battle of Bunker Hill, a turning point that showed the true cost of liberty. Join us as we trace the events of that fateful day and its impact on the broader struggle for freedom.  https://bit.ly/4dXDd2q  #AmericanHistory  #A250  #BattleofBunkerHill

Students gathered at Oklahoma State Universitys Tulsa campus last week to make their pitch for funding as part of the Bill of Rights Institutes MyImpact Challenge Civics Fair. Inspired by Tulsas rich history of diverse entrepreneurship, BRI collaborated with Kidvation Global and Tulsa Changemakers for the event, which consisted of students taking part in a hack-a-thon  session. They worked to develop a solution to a problem in their local communities and made a pitch  for funding that same day, while using the constitutional principles central to the contest. Read our latest blog for more!  https://lnkd.in/evrpz34W

Our affiliate partner, Federal Flags, LLC, makes Heavy-Duty Outdoor Nylon American Flags and both commercial and residential flagpoles. All products are made in the USA. When you shop with them and use the code 'BRI5' at checkout, they will return a portion of your purchase to us. Shop today!  https://bit.ly/3z2vhMW
